Sec. 2-231. Purpose.
In recognition of the special and urgent needs for advocacy and planning on behalf of children, there is hereby established the Miami-Dade County Children's Services Council for the purpose of advising the Board of County Commissioners on matters pertaining to the provision of services and care to all children within the County. The Council shall also assist in the coordination of efforts made by the public and private sectors to plan for and enhance the availability and quality of services and programs affecting children within the County.
